findings.title: Missing or too short meta description
findings.description: Meta description is missing or too short. Write helpful snippets to improve CTR.

findings.title: Thin content (<300 words)
findings.description: Pages with less than 300 words of content may be considered thin content. Add more valuable, unique content.
